subject: Shipping Location?
description_text:
Hello,

I am considering ordering (to Bulgaria)

Simsonn Plus X  or Pro X + VAM Pro Linear Motor(3 pac/includes power supply)

But maybe I am feeling to see on the product page or checkout - where they ship from? I see estimated tax, but I'm hoping it's from EU to avoid going through customs hold-ups and payments.

Regards,

Konstantin

conversations.body_text: Hi Konstantin Dragostinov,    The pedals will be shipped from our warehouse in Germany, while the Haptics will be shipped from China, but both will go through IOSS one-stop customs clearance, so there won't be any extra taxes.

Hi guys, one more question: There's a 3-pin connector on the brake pedal, it doesn't seem to go to the control box, is it for the RGB stuff? I ordered the Pro X Ultra without the baseplate and I'm waiting for the motors to come in. I suppose I should just tuck it so it doesn't hang out?
________________________________
Sorry, we're afraid we haven't quite grasped your meaning. Would you mind taking a photograph for us?
Hi Konstantin Dragostinov,    This cable can connect to the light strip module on the riser plate. If you haven't purchased the base plate, this cable can indeed be tucked away.
